CustomField.description: ACV after subtracting customer subsidies or buyout costs.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.New_DC_architecture__c , NOT(ISBLANK(License_Term__c)) ), ACV_Bookings_SOT__c + ABS( (SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.Subsidy_Amount__c - SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.X3rd_PF_Interest_Subsidy__c) / License_Term__c * 12 ) + ABS(ACV_of_Buyouts__c), ACV_Bookings_SOT__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This value represents the true ACV by deducting buyout or subsidy amounts.
CustomField.label: ACV Less Subsidy/Buyout
